Webtoolkit AIM a.k.a. Ajax Iframe Method. It is a simple way to post and 
receive an answer. Ever wanted to upload files using AJAX like in GMAIL, 
without reloading the page? Now you can. Cross browser method to upload 
files using AJAX in only 1Kb of code.
http://www.webtoolkit.info/

Xmlnuke uses a unchanged version of WebToolkit.AIM. 

There is no formal versioning number. Downloaded from Web site in 
May 15th, 2008.

To use in your XSL you MUST add the follow snippets:
- HTMLHEADERS inside <head> section
- HTMLBODY at the end of document

All changes made by João Gilberto Magalhães at 2008-05-15
